        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');

        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>

           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6105766620.html"></div>
        </div>
I'm moving in with my boyfriend so there is a room opening up in my awesome 4br/2ba williamsburg apartment (just off Lorimer L/G and a short walk to J/M trains) BEGINNING June 1st.<br>
<br>
Brick walls, wooden floors, big kitchen/living room, central air and a HUGE deck. The only other apartment in the building that shares the deck with us are all our friends! You'd be living with 3 awesome 27-29 year old females.<br>
<br>
The bedroom looks smaller in the pictures but it is pretty spacious and has a built in wardrobe and can come furnished. It also has a door to the patio (1 of 2 ways to get to the patio from our apt). You'll have to be ok with the housemates using it occasionally to get outside. Pretty much all the time we are outside we're all be together. Either way they are super respectful so would never wake you up to go outside or just walk into your room.<br>
<br>
If interested please message me with a bit about yourself etc. No couples please. Males or females welcome though. Thanks!    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;

            pagemode = fmt;

            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');

    }());

AVAILABLE FOR SUMMER<br>
<br>
Private, comfortable, quiet space -- the top floor of a large house. <br>
<br>
Located in central East Rock in peaceful residential area, close to shops, parks, and trails. <br>
<br>
One main living space, with view of East Rock. Adjoining bathroom, with clawfoot tub and shower. Large closet. Separate storage room. <br>
<br>
Directly on Shuttle/bus route. Off-street parking.<br>
<br>
Utilities, Wifi, and use of laundry facilities included.    </section>

   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>cats are OK - purrr</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newjersey.craigslist.org/roo/6104826692.html"></div>
        </div>
Hi!<br>
<br>
I'm a professional in my 20's currently living with two others. They are both planning on moving out and I'm looking for people to help fill the void that will be left as a result of a marriage-fueled and professional absence.<br>
<br>
About the apartment:<br>
<br>
*Washer/dryer in building <br>
*Utilities ( Heat and Hot Water) included<br>
*Bedrooms have plenty of closet space and can easily fit a queen size bed, dresser, and desk. <br>
*Starbucks and grocery store across the street<br>
*Block away from bus stop which makes getting to Port Authority,NYC convenient<br>
*Conveniently located near convenience stores, restaurants/bars, and a block away from the Hudson River<br>
<br>
Looking for a professional Male or Female to share the apartment. It'd be nice to have someone reliable with a good sense of humor and an easy-going attitude. The lease starts July 1st, but the move-in-date could be sooner as my current roommates will be moving out early/mid June. <br>
<br>
If interested please email with a little bit about yourself and a link to any social media is a plus.<br>
<br>
Best of luck on your search.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

               </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">

<h2>* Central Park North** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Williamsburg**Harlem** Inwood** Morningside** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Williamsburg**Harlem** Inwood** Morningside** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Central Park** Inwood** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Central Park** Inwood** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6106088568.html"></div>

<h1>* Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Morningside** Inwood** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Morningside** Inwood** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h1><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6105355419.html"></div>
        </div>
<h3>* Morningside Heights**Harlem** Morningside** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg** Inwood** Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** West Harlem** East Harlem** Bedstuy*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Morningside Heights**Harlem** Morningside** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg** Inwood** Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** West Harlem** East Harlem** Bedstuy*</h3><hr>    </section>

            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>

<h1>* Inwood** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** East Harlem** Bushwick** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Morningside**Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Inwood** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** East Harlem** Bushwick** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Morningside**Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Morningside** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** East Harlem*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Morningside** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** East Harlem*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Washington Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Bushwick** Upper West Side** East Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Washington Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Bushwick** Upper West Side** East Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* West Harlem**Harlem** Central Park** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Inwood** Manhattanville** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* West Harlem**Harlem** Central Park** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Inwood** Manhattanville** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside Heights** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Morningside** Williamsburg**Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Park** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside Heights** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Morningside** Williamsburg**Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Park** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside**Harlem** Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Park** Central Park North** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside**Harlem** Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Park** Central Park North** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Williamsburg** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Morningside** West Harlem** Central Park** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Inwood*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Williamsburg** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Morningside** West Harlem** Central Park** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Inwood*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park North** Bushwick** East Harlem** Inwood** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Central Park** Williamsburg**Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** West Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Bushwick** East Harlem** Inwood** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Central Park** Williamsburg**Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** West Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2>* Williamsburg** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Park North**Harlem** Central Park** Morningside** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Williamsburg** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Park North**Harlem** Central Park** Morningside** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Bushwick** Central Park**Harlem** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Inwood** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Morningside** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Bushwick** Central Park**Harlem** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Inwood** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Morningside** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <div class="gallery">

<h3>* Williamsburg** Morningside** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Central Park** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** East Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Harlem** West Harlem**Harlem** Bushwick** Morningside Heights*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Williamsburg** Morningside** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Central Park** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** East Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Harlem** West Harlem**Harlem** Bushwick** Morningside Heights*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Bushwick**Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Morningside** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Manhattanville*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Bushwick**Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Morningside** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Manhattanville*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Bedstuy** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Park**Harlem** Morningside** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Bedstuy** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Park**Harlem** Morningside** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Bushwick** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Bushwick** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Williamsburg** Central Park** Washington Heights** Morningside** Central Park North** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** Manhattanville** Bedstuy**Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Upper West Side*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Williamsburg** Central Park** Washington Heights** Morningside** Central Park North** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** Manhattanville** Bedstuy**Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Upper West Side*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Bushwick** Morningside**Harlem** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Inwood** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Manhattanville** Williamsburg*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Bushwick** Morningside**Harlem** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Inwood** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Manhattanville** Williamsburg*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Central Park** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Williamsburg** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** East Harlem**Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Central Park** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Williamsburg** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** East Harlem**Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Central Park** Inwood** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** West Harlem** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Central Park** Inwood** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** West Harlem** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Central Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** East Harlem** Morningside** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Park** Manhattanville**Harlem** Inwood** Bushwick*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Central Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** East Harlem** Morningside** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Park** Manhattanville**Harlem** Inwood** Bushwick*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Morningside** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Park** Bushwick**Harlem** East Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Inwood*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Morningside** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Park** Bushwick**Harlem** East Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Inwood*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Central Park**Harlem** Washington Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper East Side** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Central Park**Harlem** Washington Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Inwood** Central Park** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Park North** Manhattanville** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Morningside** Upper East Side**Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Inwood** Central Park** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** Central Park North** Manhattanville** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Morningside** Upper East Side**Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Central Harlem** East Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Williamsburg** Inwood** Bushwick** West Harlem** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** Morningside*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Central Harlem** East Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Williamsburg** Inwood** Bushwick** West Harlem** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** Morningside*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Williamsburg**Harlem** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** West Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Manhattanville** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** Central Park** Washington Heights** Bedstuy*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Williamsburg**Harlem** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** West Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Manhattanville** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** Central Park** Washington Heights** Bedstuy*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Morningside Heights** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Morningside** Manhattanville** Inwood**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Park North** Central Park** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Morningside Heights** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Morningside** Manhattanville** Inwood**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Park North** Central Park** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Washington Heights*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Williamsburg** Morningside**Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Central Park** Bushwick** Bedstuy** East Harlem** Inwood*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Williamsburg** Morningside**Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Central Park** Bushwick** Bedstuy** East Harlem** Inwood*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Central Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Inwood**Harlem** Upper West Side** West Harlem** Central Park North*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Central Harlem** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Inwood**Harlem** Upper West Side** West Harlem** Central Park North*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Central Park North** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Inwood** Morningside** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Central Park*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Central Park North** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Inwood** Morningside** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Central Park*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** West Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Morningside** Central Park North** Central Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Inwood** Upper West Side** Central Park** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** West Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Morningside** Central Park North** Central Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Inwood** Upper West Side** Central Park** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Upper East Side** Central Park** Bedstuy** East Harlem**Harlem** Central Harlem** Inwood** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Manhattanville** West Harlem** Morningside*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Upper East Side** Central Park** Bedstuy** East Harlem**Harlem** Central Harlem** Inwood** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Manhattanville** West Harlem** Morningside*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>

<h2>* Upper West Side** East Harlem** West Harlem** Central Harlem**Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Upper West Side** East Harlem** West Harlem** Central Harlem**Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Park North** Washington Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Washington Heights** Central Park North** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Morningside*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Washington Heights** Central Park North** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Morningside*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Inwood** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Central Park** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Morningside** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Bedstuy**Harlem** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Inwood** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Central Park** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Morningside** Washington Heights** Williamsburg** Bedstuy**Harlem** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>    </section>

<span class="price">$1050</span> <span id="titletextonly">large room in 2 bed apartment</span><small> (bushwick)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">

</h2>
<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">

             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01"

Big bedroom with lots of natural light! 2 blocks from M&L train, 20 mins to union sq! Large closet in room. Shared kitchen, living room, and bathroom. Big living room/dining area. Looking for somebody to move in mid May or June 1. 1St and last month's rent plus security to move in. Good credit and income will only qualify.Please contact Rebecca for pictures via email.    </section>

    <div id="thumbs"><a id="1_thumb_c1eLrDEIvet" class="thumb" data-imgid="c1eLrDEIvet" href="https://images.craigslist.org/00W0W_c1eLrDEIvet_600x450.jpg" title="1"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/00W0W_c1eLrDEIvet_50x50c.jpg" class="selected" alt=" 1"></a><a id="2_thumb_jQ32sCJfo4H" class="thumb" data-imgid="jQ32sCJfo4H" href="https://images.craigslist.org/00y0y_jQ32sCJfo4H_600x450.jpg" title="2"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/00y0y_jQ32sCJfo4H_50x50c.jpg"  alt=" 2"></a><a id="3_thumb_6oTgSxlQwTx" class="thumb" data-imgid="6oTgSxlQwTx" href="https://images.craigslist.org/01717_6oTgSxlQwTx_600x450.jpg" title="3"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/01717_6oTgSxlQwTx_50x50c.jpg"  alt=" 3"></a><a id="4_thumb_j9lF6oSz8iz" class="thumb" data-imgid="j9lF6oSz8iz" href="https://images.craigslist.org/00T0T_j9lF6oSz8iz_600x450.jpg" title="4"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/00T0T_j9lF6oSz8iz_50x50c.jpg"  alt=" 4"></a><a id="5_thumb_6Y7PGOs71sN" class="thumb" data-imgid="6Y7PGOs71sN" href="https://images.craigslist.org/00L0L_6Y7PGOs71sN_600x450.jpg" title="5"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/00L0L_6Y7PGOs71sN_50x50c.jpg"  alt=" 5"></a><a id="6_thumb_jMQGwWVYyZ4" class="thumb" data-imgid="jMQGwWVYyZ4" href="https://images.craigslist.org/00R0R_jMQGwWVYyZ4_600x450.jpg" title="6"><img src="https://images.craigslist.org/00R0R_jMQGwWVYyZ4_50x50c.jpg"  alt=" 6"></a></div>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>laundry in bldg</span><br>
           <span>attached garage</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
